rulings.text: If you conntrol two Parish Paragons and damage is dealt to one of them, the damage will really be dealt to that creature.

If you control more than one Parish Paragon, all damage that would be dealt at once to other creatures you control is dealt to one of them of your choice, and the damage that would be dealt to that Parish Paragon is dealt to the second.
